targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   forecast,
   CAST(day1 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day1,
   CAST(day8 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day8,
   CAST(day15 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day15,
   CAST(day20 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day20
   -- CASE WHEN "$task" = 'rainy_onset' THEN CAST(day22 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) END as day22,
   -- CASE WHEN "$task" = 'rainy_onset' THEN CAST(day29 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) END as day29,
   -- CASE WHEN "$task" = 'rainy_onset' THEN CAST(day36 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) END as day36
FROM "$metrics_tab_name";

-- SELECT 
--    forecast,
--    CAST(day1 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day1,
--    CAST(day8 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day8,
--    CAST(day15 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day15,
--    CAST(day22 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day22,
--    CAST(day29 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day29,
--    CAST(day36 AS FLOAT) / (24 * 60 * 60) as day36
-- FROM "$metrics_tab_name";

-- dummy query to ensure that plot refreshes when the variable changes
-- SELECT $group_by_lead_time
select '${forecast} ${baseline}'

list.label: Metric
list.name: metric
list.query: MAE : mae, Bias : bias, RMSE : rmse

list.label: Baseline
list.name: baseline
list.query: ECMWF IFS ER : ecmwf_ifs_er, ECMWF IFS ER Debiased : ecmwf_ifs_er_debiased, Clim. 2004-2015 : climatology_2015, FuXi : fuxi

list.label: Ground Truth
list.name: truth
list.query: ERA5 : era5, GHCN : ghcn, Clim. 2004-2015 : climatology_2015

list.label: Ground Truth
list.name: truth2
list.query: ERA5 : era5, GHCN : ghcn, Clim. 2004-2015 : climatology_2015

list.label: Forecast
list.name: forecast
list.query: ECMWF IFS ER : ecmwf_ifs_er, ECMWF IFS ER Debiased : ecmwf_ifs_er_debiased, Clim. 2004-2015 : climatology_2015, FuXi : fuxi
